Title: Sphere
Writer: Michael Crichton (novel), Kurt Wimmer (adaptation), Stephen Hauser (screenplay), Paul Attanasio (screenplay)
Actors: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone, Samuel L. Jackson, Peter Coyote
Plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.
Production: Baltimore Pictures, Constant c Productions, Punch Productions
